If notability cannot be shown, the article is likely to be merged, redirected, or deleted. *Find sources:* "Kaki Bukit SC" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(November 2018)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Football club **Kaki Bukit Sports Club** is a Singaporean football club based in [Kaki Bukit, Singapore](/wiki/Kaki_Bukit,_Singapore). The club is currently competing in the [Singapore Football League 2](/wiki/Singapore_Football_League). Kaki Bukit SC won the 3rd division (now known as Island Wide League) in 2006, and finish as [runner-ups](/wiki/List_of_Singapore%27s_football_leagues_winners) in the 2nd division (now known as Singapore Football League 2) in 2007 and 2010. In 2024, under a collaborative effort between the club and Team Ohana's management, Kaki Bukit SC will be sending a Women's team to participate in the [Women's National League (Singapore)](/wiki/2024_Women%27s_National_League_(Singapore)). ## Current season ### Singapore Football League 2 #### League table PosTeam - [v](/wiki/2025_Singapore_Football_League#sports-table-League_2) - t - e PldWDLGFGAGDPts1Bishan Barx FC (C)1814315513+42452South Avenue SC (P)1814224911+38443Warwick Knights FC1813235623+33414GDT Circuit FC189274139+2295Starlight Soccerites FC189273639−3296Admiralty CSN186393143−12217Kaki Bukit SC1844102834−6168GFA Victoria FC1843112453−29159Westwood El'Junior FC1824121936−171010Tiong Bahru FC (R)1813142573−486Source: Football Association of Singapore Rules for classification: 1) points; 2) goal difference; 3) number of goals scored; 4) number of wins (C) Champions; (P) Promoted; (R) Relegated ### Women's National League #### Round robin PosTeam - [v](/wiki/2025_Women%27s_National_League_(Singapore)#sports-table-League_table) - t - e PldWDLGFGAGDPts1[Mattar Sailors FC](/wiki/2025_Lion_City_Sailors_Women_season) (C)121011518+43312Jungfrau Punggol FC129123513+22283Eastern Thunder FC12813349+25254Unity FC127144216+26225Kaki Bukit SC122192149−2876[Royal Arion Women's FC](/wiki/2025_Aerion_Women%27s_FC_season)1220101431−1767GDT Circuit FC121110576−714Source: FAS Rules for classification: 1) points; 2) goal difference; 3) number of goals scored; 4) number of wins (C) Champions - Kaki Bukit SC on [Instagram](/wiki/Instagram_(identifier)) - Kaki Bukit SC on FAS official website - Singapore Football League 2 - 2024 Kaki Bukit SC Women's Team This article about a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) [football](/wiki/Association_football) club is a stub.
